directions: Pour the tomato juice, hot sauce, Worcestershire sauce, dill, seafood seasoning, celery salt, and vodka into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into ice-filled glasses, and garnish with cornichons to serve.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon hot sauce such as Tabasco
1 tablespoon seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™
title: The Ultimate Shaken Bloody Mary
